name: AP Theme
description: A sophisticated and luxurious UI theme for NodeBB, inspired by Audemars Piguet's artistic direction. Features a refined color palette with Timber Green, Pink Gold accents, and Bleu Nuit secondary colors. Typography system combines elegant serif fonts for branding with geometric sans-serif for headings and highly legible sans-serif for body text. Includes subtle Tapisserie pattern textures, sharp geometric design elements, and a minimalist spacious layout.
